long_description: Turn your BioLite CampStove(TM) (sold separately) into a wood-burning grill that you can cook all your favorite foods on. Steel grill surface fits up to 4 hamburger patties or 6 hotdogs; high, medium and low temperature zones help you grill your foods to perfection. Stoke the fire in the CampStove by simply flipping open the fuel intake lid on the grill and adding more wood; fueling the fire won't interrupt your grilling. Compact, portable design features folding legs and a durable plastic travel cover so you can take the grill anywhere. BioLite Wood-Burning CampStove is sold separately.
short_description: Turn your BioLite CampStove(TM) (sold separately) into a wood-burning grill that you can cook all your favorite foods on.
